--- select_singer_with_table_alias.sql
SELECT
  S.*,
  S.SingerId as ID,
  S.FirstName
FROM Singers S

--- AST
&parser.QueryStatement{
  Hint:  (*parser.Hint)(nil),
  Query: &parser.Select{
    pos:      0,
    Distinct: false,
    AsStruct: false,
    Results:  []parser.SelectItem{
      &parser.StarPath{
        end:  12,
        Expr: &parser.Ident{
          pos:  9,
          end:  10,
          Name: "S",
        },
      },
      &parser.Alias{
        Expr: &parser.Path{
          Idents: []*parser.Ident{
            &parser.Ident{
              pos:  16,
              end:  17,
              Name: "S",
            },
            &parser.Ident{
              pos:  18,
              end:  26,
              Name: "SingerId",
            },
          },
        },
        As: &parser.AsAlias{
          pos:   27,
          Alias: &parser.Ident{
            pos:  30,
            end:  32,
            Name: "ID",
          },
        },
      },
      &parser.ExprSelectItem{
        Expr: &parser.Path{
          Idents: []*parser.Ident{
            &parser.Ident{
              pos:  36,
              end:  37,
              Name: "S",
            },
            &parser.Ident{
              pos:  38,
              end:  47,
              Name: "FirstName",
            },
          },
        },
      },
    },
    From: &parser.From{
      pos:   48,
      Items: []*parser.FromItem{
        &parser.FromItem{
          Source: &parser.Unnest{
            pos:      53,
            end:      62,
            Implicit: true,
            Expr:     &parser.Ident{
              pos:  53,
              end:  60,
              Name: "Singers",
            },
            Hint: (*parser.Hint)(nil),
            As:   &parser.AsAlias{
              pos:   61,
              Alias: &parser.Ident{
                pos:  61,
                end:  62,
                Name: "S",
              },
            },
            WithOffset: (*parser.WithOffset)(nil),
          },
          TableSample: (*parser.TableSample)(nil),
        },
      },
    },
    Where:   (*parser.Where)(nil),
    GroupBy: (*parser.GroupBy)(nil),
    Having:  (*parser.Having)(nil),
    OrderBy: (*parser.OrderBy)(nil),
    Limit:   (*parser.Limit)(nil),
  },
}

--- SQL
SELECT S.*, S.SingerId AS ID, S.FirstName FROM Singers AS S
